languages.text: "Эттфатер? Легко ли твое сердце? Не гложет ли его темное предчувствие? Скажи слово, и я заменю тебя во главе отряда".
"Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."
languages.original_text: "Эттфатер? Легко ли твое сердце? Не гложет ли его темное предчувствие? Скажи слово, и я заменю тебя во главе отряда".

traits.locale_text: "Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."
"Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."
"Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."
"Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."
"Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."

languages.text: “狼领？你的心还平静吗？是某种不祥的预感在啃噬它吗？只要你发话，我就可以替你带队前进。”
languages.original_text: "Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."

traits.locale_text: “狼领？你的心还平静吗？是某种不祥的预感在啃噬它吗？只要你发话，我就可以替你带队前进。”

languages.text: «¿Aett-Vater? ¿Está su corazón en calma? ¿Tiene un presentimiento siniestro? Solo tiene que decirlo y l{mf|e|a} reemplazaré como líder del escuadrón».
languages.original_text: "Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."

traits.locale_text: «¿Aett-Vater? ¿Está su corazón en calma? ¿Tiene un presentimiento siniestro? Solo tiene que decirlo y l{mf|e|a} reemplazaré como líder del escuadrón».

languages.text: 「アエット＝ヴァテル？安堵してるのか？不吉な予感に苛まれているか？一言言ってくれれば、俺がお前に代わって部隊の先頭に立ってやる」
languages.original_text: "Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."

traits.locale_text: 「アエット＝ヴァテル？安堵してるのか？不吉な予感に苛まれているか？一言言ってくれれば、俺がお前に代わって部隊の先頭に立ってやる」

languages.text: "Aett-Vater? Ist Euer Herz ruhig? Nagt eine dunkle Vorahnung daran? Ein Wort von Euch reicht und ich ersetze Euch als Leiter des Trupps."
languages.original_text: "Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."

traits.locale_text: "Aett-Vater? Ist Euer Herz ruhig? Nagt eine dunkle Vorahnung daran? Ein Wort von Euch reicht und ich ersetze Euch als Leiter des Trupps."

languages.text: « Aett-vater ? Votre cœur est-il en paix ? N'est-il pas tiraillé par quelque sombre pressentiment ? Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire et je vous remplacerai volontiers à la tête de l'escadron. »
languages.original_text: "Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."

traits.locale_text: « Aett-vater ? Votre cœur est-il en paix ? N'est-il pas tiraillé par quelque sombre pressentiment ? Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire et je vous remplacerai volontiers à la tête de l'escadron. »

languages.text: "Aett-Vater... Yüreğin dingin mi? Yoksa onu karanlık önseziler mi kemiriyor? Söylemen yeterli, senin yerine adamların başına geçebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Aett-Vater? Is your heart at ease? Does a dark foreboding gnaw at it? Just say the word, and I'll replace you at the head of the squad."
